data.eml:eml: Notes on the genus Indocnemis Laidlaw, 1917 in Vietnam with description of Indocnemismarijanmatoki sp. n. (Odonata, Zygoptera, Platycnemididae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Phan, Quoc Toan (2018): Notes on the genus Indocnemis Laidlaw, 1917 in Vietnam with description of Indocnemismarijanmatoki sp. n. (Odonata, Zygoptera, Platycnemididae). ZooKeys 809: 15-29, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.809.29058, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.809.29058
